column2: select top # s.specobjid, s.bestobjid, s.firstrelease, s.survey, s.sourcetype, p.ra, p.raErr, p.dec, p.decErr, s.z, s.zErr, p.modelMag_g from Specobj as s join Photoobj as p on p.objid = s.bestobjid where p.petroMag_r< # and ABS ((p.r-p.i) + (p.g-p.r) /#+#) < # and p.petroMag_r+#*log (petroR5#_r**#*#*#) < # and p.psfMag_r-p.modelMag_r> # and p.petroMag_r< #+ (#* (p.g-p.r) +#* ((p.r-p.i) #) )/#
